Overview   Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package WYSIWYM.transformer

Class Summary
Aggregator Aggregator performs syntactic aggregation within a paragraph.
AutomaticGenerator AutomaticGenerator adds automatically generated information to the semantic graph, such as the date of deposit and the depositor details.
BrowsingGenerator BrowsingGenerator generates the feedback text of an object in the database, adding both options for adding information and for viewing hidden information.
BrowsingPlanner Deprecated.  
ContentPlanner ContentPlanner plans the text; it creates a text plan from a semantic graph.
DependencyTreeTransformer DependencyTreeTransformer.java performs all transformations on a DependencyTree.
FeedbackTextGenerator FeedbackTextGenerator steers the process of turning the semantic graph into a feedback text.
GraphTransformer Provides some basic graph transforming functionalities, like adding/removing nodes and edges.
QueryBuilder QueryBuilder steers the process of building a query; a feedbacktextgenerator for the querying module.
QueryPlanner QueryPlanner plans a query; it creates a query plan from a semantic graph.
QueryRealiser QueryRealiser realises queries; the main difference with the standard SurfaceRealiser is that the surface form is an html-list.
QueryResultGenerator QueryResultGenerator generates the feedback text of all objects that matched a certain query.
QueryResultPlanner Plans the brief description of a resource that has been found through a query.
SemanticGraphTransformer SemanticGraphTransformer performs operations on the SemanticGraph.
SpecificationTransformer SpecificationTransformer takes a Dependency Tree and performs some transformation:, it can transform a tree to a relative clause, a query statement, or, knowing that a particular node has been pluralised, can pluralise the rest of the tree.
SurfaceRealiser SurfaceRealiser handles linearisation and morphology tasks It uses the SimpleNLG package (Reiter, 2006) for surface realisation
TextFrame TextFrame is a document type-to-semantic graph mapper, to create the initial semantic graph.
TextPlanner TextPlanner plans the text; it creates a text plan from a semantic graph.
